title: Mysterious Potion

fields.name: Effects List:
fields.value:
1. You become **Happy**
2. You become **Tipsy**
3. One of your cards becomes **Enhanced** 1.
4. One of your cards becomes **Stoned**.

desc:
Post 1782
- When this card is first spawned, each effect from the Effects List below is secretly matched to a color from <:rgby:1107167371048788028>.
- The effect of this card will thus depend on which <:rgby:1107167371048788028> color is has, possibly having multiple effects if it is given multiple colors by an external effect.
- All future copies of (1782) Mysterious Potion in this game will follow the same <:rgby:1107167371048788028> effect list as this one, but players won't be told what color gives what effect until they use a (1782) Mysterious Potion potion with that color.
- When used, the next player gains a new copy of (1782) Mysterious Potion.
